actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include a percentage of the inpatient days attributable to patients in a hospital's psychiatric unit in the formula used to determine the eligibility of a hospital for a disproportionate share adjustment in the amount paid to the hospital for the operating costs of inpatient hospital services under part A of the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include 25 percent of the inpatient days attributable to patients in a hospital's psychiatric unit in the formula used in determining whether a hospital serves a disproportionate share of low-income patients and is thereby eligible for an additional Medicare payment.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include a percentage of the inpatient days attributable to patients in a hospital's psychiatric unit in the formula used to determine the eligibility of a hospital for a disproportionate share adjustment in the amount paid to the hospital for the operating costs of inpatient hospital services under part A of the medicare program.
